author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35782.
   * further simplification of `DetectorStateFilter` using templated functions
   * remove leftover empty file `SimpleEventFilter.h` 
   * add unit tests using a MWGR#5 2020 run with mixed HV states (Strips ON and Pixels OFF)
   
#### PR validation:

The unit tests added in this PR are running.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Further simplification of `DetectorStateFilter` and add unit tests
